name: [PROJECT LAZARUS]
description:
[PROJECT LAZARUS] is a stealth based 2D platformer in which the player controls Lazarus, a damaged prototype cyborg that has to escape the facility where he misteriously wakes up. To do so he has to use abilities such as hiding to avoid enemies, sticking himself in walls, and his special ability, the sixth sense, which allows him to see what is hidden in plain sight.

This is just the beggining of Lazarus' quest.

Developers: 

  • David Fernández Segura:     Programmer
  • Sergi Gómez Segura:            Artist
  • Albert González Carbó:       Artist
  • Xavi Lucena Pallarès:            Programmer
  • Sergi Monreal Ibáñez:          Programmer

Special thanks to  Jordi Jiménez for composing the game's soundtrack and to Eric Fernández for aiding him

This project was made for learning purposes.
